description: These will be used as fallback values when updating Smart Invoice, this will prevent transaction errors.

description:
• Smart Invoice utilizes the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) as the standardized classification system for products and services.
  • All classifications of products must be done at commodity level. Where a commodity level does not apply, the closest must be utilized in classifying products or service.
